"Towards the Future":
"I'm interested in these \"Darkers\".
I've got a nose for things like this. They
smell like something dangerous from Ragol...
Take me to where they come from.
What, worried about escorting a lady?
I'm sure you'll do whatever it takes to
keep me safe. But don't slow me down,
or I'll leave you behind.
※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
only by Kireek and Rico"

"Rico's PC
※Given on acceptance
※No presents given for boosting friendship"
